article_text:
Double Take 'Toons: Mid Term-ites?

Democrats and Republicans are concerned that their records could hurt them in 2014. Gary Varvel needles Democrats over Obamacare, while Mike Luckovich thinks the far right could defang GOP prospects.

toggle caption Gary Varvel
